posts.post_content:
Purely for casual but I'm thinking R/B with cards like  [Goblin Arsonist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Goblin Arsonist ) ,  [Magma Phoenix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Magma Phoenix ) , and  [Caustic Hound](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Caustic Hound ) . If you have enough of those cards onto the board wiping all of your permanents could be extremely bad for your opponent. It forces them into the position of trying to block or destroy whatever is holding that blade. Even if they kill the creature things like Goblin Arsonist and Caustic Hound are gonna splash them anyway and if its the Magma Phoenix there's a good chance all the rest of your bombs will blow anyway so that means they start blocking with creatures that can't kill Magma Phoenix which means you whittle down their forces anyway.  
  
You pretty much force them to lose by putting them in the situation of definitely losing or playing safe enough to maybe not lose. I believe there can be a good strategy for nearly any card if you look hard enough. Even my precious and beloved  [Knowledge Pool /autoca](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Knowledge Pool /autoca)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
